sourcesContent:
import Grid2 from "@mui/material/Unstable_Grid2/Grid2";
import AssessmentCard from "../components/AssessmentCard";
import { Stack } from "@mui/material";
import CheckboxField from "../components/CheckboxField";

const Step5 = () => {
    return (
        <React.Fragment>
            <AssessmentContent title="Bonus Questions: things that can be helpful, but are not part of the basics necessities." >
                <Grid2 container spacing={2}>
                    <Grid2 xs={6}>
                        <AssessmentCard title="Recommended">
                            <Checklist>
                                <CheckboxField name="P2_1" label="Team has a dedicated Scrum Master" />
                                <CheckboxField name="P2_2" label="Team has a dedicated Product Owner" />
                                <CheckboxField name="P2_3" label="Team has a Definition of Ready" />
                                <CheckboxField name="P2_4" label="Team has a Definition of Done" />
                                <CheckboxField name="P2_5" label="Team has a Definition of Ready" />
                            </Checklist>
                        </AssessmentCard>
                    </Grid2>
                    <Grid2 xs={6}>
                        <Stack spacing={2}>
                            <AssessmentCard title="Scaling">
                                <CheckboxField name="P2_1" label="Team has a dedicated Scrum Master" />
                            </AssessmentCard>
                            <AssessmentCard title="Postive Indicators">
                                <Checklist>
                                    <CheckboxField name="P3_1" label="Team is co-located" />
                                    <CheckboxField name="P3_2" label="Team has a dedicated Scrum Master" />
                                    <CheckboxField name="P3_3" label="Team has a dedicated Product Owner" />
                                    <CheckboxField name="P3_4" label="Team has a Definition of Ready" />
                                    <CheckboxField name="P3_5" label="Team has a Definition of Done" />
                                </Checklist>
                            </AssessmentCard>
                        </Stack>
                    </Grid2>
                </Grid2>
            </AssessmentContent>
        </React.Fragment >
    );
}
export default Step5;
